about_the_game:
The demo of Fallen Down contains the first three books of the story, and the first level of arcade mode.

Story mode contains 52,000 words, with 25 fights with a normal version and hard mode. It spans 4 character levels.

Arcade mode has 34 nodes, each with many options.

All progress in the demo carries over to the normal version.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains legal and sensible alcohol consumption.  Contains fantasy violence and depictions of heroes battling for a better world.  Contains a lot of heroic swearing and cursing.
